thread.title: London offers a summer of film, music and theatre for the filmTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: London offers a summer of film, music and theatre for the filmTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: London offers a summer of film, music and theatre for the filmTravelandtourworld.com
text:
London offers a summer of film, music and theatre for the film Published on : Saturday, August 8, 2015
Enjoy a packed programme of music, theatre, dance, comedy and film screenings at one of London’s best alfresco venues as part of a summer-long free festival. Now in its 13th year, the More London Free Festival features a high-calibre of talent in the 1000-seater riverside setting of The Scoop. There’s no need to book seats, just turn up and enjoy the show.
There will be free theatre shows during August including family show Captain Showoff! and Greek tragedy Hecuba and the Trojan Women.
Free film in September will be the highlight including The Imitation Game, The Theory of Everything, Still Alice, Paddington, To Kill a Mockingbird and Ghostbusters.
There’s no need to book seats, just turn up and enjoy the show! Seats will be allocated on a first-come first-served basis so arrive early. Cushions are available to hire.
Bring your own picnic (no glass is allowed) or buy food and drinks from the many cafes in More London. This year, a new pop-up food experience, London Riviera, will be offering food and drink inspired by French Riviera chic and Miami glamour.
In the event of rain, the show may have to be cancelled.
Source: visitlondon.com
